solveDescription.projects: I have worked on projects all over Brazil.

article_one.article_description: Over the years I have interacted and worked with various market technologies such as JavaScript, Kotlin, PHP, Java, Python, .Net, among others. As a result, I had the opportunity to work on several projects throughout Brazil.

article_two.article_title: What have I done in these projects?
article_two.article_description: I have worked on various types of projects, such as integrations, server configuration and hosting, stock automation, among others. With that, I gained experience to adapt to various situations and work with different approaches and technologies.

article_three.article_title: What am I looking for now?
article_three.article_description: Currently, I am looking for my first full-time job opportunity and preparing to enter higher education. In parallel, I continue to improve my knowledge in scalable software, data structures, and UI/UX.

project_one.title: Resend
responsabilities: Configured a complete Linux (Ubuntu) server ensuring security and stability for email sending.
Implemented an automated routine (cron) for scheduled email dispatches.
Developed a robust API with sending routes and CRUD to integrate the email service.
Created endpoints to validate and configure exclusive domains per user.
Configured and hosted the web server using Apache following security best practices.

project_two.title: Ozon Solution
responsabilities: Integrated WooCommerce with Kommo CRM via API for data synchronization.
Set up a CI/CD pipeline to automate testing and deployment, streamlining development flow.
Created a system that dynamically generates leads in the CRM based on WooCommerce sales.
Improved system performance by 38% using object-oriented principles.
Implemented data sending via Webhook to ensure operation traceability.

project_three.title: ERP Bling Automation
responsabilities: Developed an API to communicate with Bling (ERP), facilitating order and stock management.
Hosted services on AWS (Lambda, EC3, and Amazon EventBridge), optimizing costs and scalability.
Automated OAuth 2.0 token renewal, ensuring continuous service.
Created request routines and listeners via Webhook to sync stock in real time.
Integrated the system with Amazon SQS to manage asynchronous request delivery.

project_four.title: Aideia
responsabilities: Integrated WordPress form with ClickUP, unifying lead data collection.
Created leads through the ClickUP API, automating information intake flow.
Updated CI/CD pipeline to ensure versioning and continuous deployment.
Developed a custom form to collect and send data to ClickUP.
Set up a test environment for future maintenance, ensuring quality and stability.

project_five.title: JumpVerso
responsabilites: Created a web interface to display registered user data, facilitating profile management.
Developed a server to manage authentication, ensuring user security.
Integrated Evolution API (WhatsApp) with the web platform for automated communication.
Implemented QR Code generation for simplified WhatsApp authentication.
Created a group selection system for automatic sending via Webhook, expanding campaign reach.
